istarget: C,L,R represent central, left or right target, 0 means no target
stimC: stimulus number of central image (-1 is no image)
stimL: stimulus number of left image (-1 is no image)
stimR: stimulus number of right image (-1 is no image)
stimnameL: name of stimulus on left (or no image)
stimnameR: name of stimulus on right (or no image)
stimnameC: name of stimulus central (or no image)
response: 0 when no response, or 1 for response
rt: time of response, but this isn't accurate
correct: correct response to a target (1) or not (0)
time_stimon: stimulus onset time (s), relative to experiment start
time_stimoff: stimulus offset time (s), relative to experiment start
